title: Can't enter to game.
body:
from 4 days ago, I suddenly can't get into game.
I can queue, select champ, but can't enter to game.
I tried to restart, reconnect, and also re-download.
However, it still don't let me play the game!
Because of that, I lost 5 ranked games.
Therefore, my point was going down and also I have to wait 30 min for every game.
what can I do?
Can anybody help me?

replies.body:
This issue is often caused by conflicting network settings local to your home network. To ensure those settings are all properly configured, I'd like you to work through the steps outlined in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). If you should continue to experience this issue after taking those steps, we can investigate further.

Please let me know if you notice any changes after taking those steps.
